title: Slight jhin buff idea
body:
Well, cutting straight to the heart of the topic, I want jhin to have a buff, not that there's anything wrong with him for the moment, it's just that, he underperforms in some aspects and that is sustain dps in drawn out fights, so to leviate this problem a bit, I think   tampering with his reload mechanic could be a good start, so here s my suggestion


Every time he adds a point to his ult(which is on lvl 6,11 and 16) , whisper's reload will be reduced by 0.333 second (totalling 0.999 second or 1.0 second at lvl 16), this will give jhin a bit more leeway in emptying his clip without suffering much punishment if you chose the wrong moment in doing so and will give jhin a bit more sustained dps againt's beefier targets while not losing much to the enemy adc's in terms of damage dealt per skirmishes or team fights.

Here's a bonus idea, jhins Q(bouncing grenades) will have an aoe effect starting from 150 units radius which increases by 50 each bounce(100 if it kills), getting hit by additional explosions will  only deal 30% dmg, this skill is very good for wave clearing as it is so don't really care about it too much, I just want it to explode because of its name sake.

replies.body:
because he trades "traditional dps" for a lot more burst.
